properties.comment: Communication and Motives of Self-Governance Phase 2 Configuration
properties.entry:
Group Chat

Please read the following instructions carefully

From this point forward, you will be able to communicate with the members of your group. If you want to communicate with the people in your group, type your message in the Chat window and hit the enter key. You will be able to chat for {self.chatDuration} seconds before the next round. You will also be able to chat during each round.

Guidelines for Communication

You are free to communicate as much or little as you want, and you can discuss anything you like. However, please do not (1) discuss side payments that would result in exchange of money outside the experiment or (2) make physical threats.

If you have any questions please raise your hand.
